value.title: Google team uses AI to create next-gen chips faster than humans

value.title: Mythic launches power-sipping AI chip
value.excerpt: Semiconductor startup Mythic has launched an artificial intelligence (AI) processor that it says will deliver the computing capabilities of a GPU for a tenth of the power. The M1076 Mythic AMP chip targets edge computing AI applications with power and footprint limitations.

value.title: Who Won The Latest AI Drag Race? AWS Or NVIDIA?

value.title: Man Group-Oxford Quants Say Their AI Can Predict Stock Moves
value.excerpt: Man Group Plc-backed researchers at the University of Oxford say they’ve created a machine-learning program that can project how share prices move -- notching an 80% success rate for the equivalent of about 30 seconds of live trading.
